arts.ttl: “How much I love you my Sevilla” – Jesus Navas opens up ahead of final Ramon Sanchez-Pizjuan appearance
arts.sum: On Saturday, Sevilla will play their penultimate match of 2024 as they host Celta Vigo at the Ramon Sanchez-Pizjuan. It promises to be a special and emotional occasion as it will be the final home match in the career of club legend Jesus Navas. arts.ttl: Sevilla lose midfielder for rest of 2024 as thigh injury diagnosis is confirmed
arts.sum: It’s not been an easy few weeks for Sevilla, who have won only one of their last five La Liga matches.
